hero.subtitle: Approach a healthy and fresh lifestyle
hero.description:
Fresh, healthy breakfast.
Eating every day is good for health and spirit
Order now, get 20% off your first order!

banners.about_description: Speak Fresh is where you find your favorite fresh fruits! We carefully select Vietnamese and imported fruits, ensuring the best quality when they reach your hands in Ho Chi Minh City. Easy shopping, fast delivery ‚Äì Enjoying natural flavors has never been simpler!
banners.quality_description: Committed to bringing the freshest products to your family
banners.fresh_daily_desc: We are committed to bringing the freshest fruit products, carefully selected from reputable orchards.
banners.fresh_today_description: Need fresh fruits for today? Speak Fresh provides diverse choices, fast delivery in Ho Chi Minh City for you to enjoy right away.

quality_features.natural_desc: Fruits are grown and harvested from fertile lands, ensuring clear origin and traceability.
quality_features.quality_desc: Every product undergoes strict quality control processes, ensuring freshness and safety.
quality_features.farm_desc: Shortening the supply chain, bringing fresh fruits directly from farms to consumers.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: About PEAKFRESH
about.hero_description: We believe that everyone deserves to enjoy the freshest and most nutritious fruits
about.mission_description_1: PEAKFRESH is committed to bringing customers the freshest fruit products, carefully selected from reputable growing regions domestically and internationally.
about.mission_description_2: We continuously strive to improve processes, applying modern technology in preservation and transportation, ensuring fruits maintain their freshness when reaching consumers.

values.natural_desc: We are committed to providing fresh fruit products, grown and harvested from the most fertile lands.
values.quality_desc: Every product undergoes strict quality control processes to ensure the highest quality standards.
values.sustainable_desc: We apply sustainable and environmentally friendly farming methods throughout the entire production process.
values.partner_desc: Building sustainable relationships with farmers and partners, ensuring stable supply and quality.

milestones.2018_desc: PEAKFRESH was established with the mission to bring the freshest fruit products.
milestones.2019_desc: Developed partner network and expanded service coverage nationwide.
milestones.2020_desc: Launched e-commerce platform, making it easier for customers to access products.
milestones.2023_desc: Achieved sustainable agriculture certification and expanded international partnerships.
